thread.title: Save 15% on tickets to the RadioTimes Festival
thread.title_full: Save 15% on tickets to the RadioTimes Festival - Telegraph

author: The Telegraph
title: Save 15% on tickets to the RadioTimes Festival
text: The Radio Times Festival will be held on The Green, Hampton Court, London from 24 to 27 September, 2015. There will be more than 70 individual events so why not make a day of it and plan your perfect programme. There will also be delicious food and drink from gourmet street stalls on offer, exclusive screenings and a host of free events too. How to claim: Click here to visit the Radio Times Festival website, browse the programme of events and enter the promotional code TELEM when buying tickets online. Terms and conditions: Please note, you will need ticket to at least one session to access the festival ground. 15% Discount offer applicable to adult sessions only when you purchase a multiple of 3 sessions. Offer excludes special events including Robin Windsor’s masterclass. Booking transaction fee of £1.95 per booking applies. Children up to the age of 5 are admitted free, but must be seated on an adult’s lap. Children's tickets are for those aged 6-16. If you need to bring a companion, assistant or guider with you to any sessions, to maximise your enjoyment, then that carer will be admitted free of charge, please call the box office on 0871 2305 539 (calls cost 10p per minute plus standard network charges) for more details and to arrange this. @telegraph
